name: #1 "Trust"
description:
Trust is the hope that something will happen or that someone will act as you wish. 

 This is the first piece of the collection "diorama of emotions" which consists of 16 pieces inspired by the wheel of emotions created by psychologist Robert Plutchik.
 
Starting from the psychological basis I seek to represent through the architecture and the fantasy environment each of the emotions that Plutchik defines as those that make up the psyche of the human being.
